column1: Q1 COMPARISON: OLD WINDOWS vs NEW WINDOWS
1. Wait until April 2026 (after Q1 2026 is complete)
2. Download Jan-Mar 2026 weather data from Environment Canada
3. Record your fuel fills from Jan-Mar 2026
5. Compare to Q1 2025 baseline to measure window impact
NOTE: Q1 comparison is ideal because:
• Window impact will be most measurable in cold weather
